content: SeedlyTV EP05 Regular Shares Savings Plans (RSS) REITs Investments Asked by Wong Weng SoonAsked on 23 May 2019How do I buy REIT? Am i able to buy through Regular Saving Plan?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Ashley Wong, Financial Assistant at Multi Management & Future SolutionsLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 24 May 2019Investing in REITs is similar to trading shares on the stock exchange. For trading and investing in best REITs, you must hold 2 accounts namely: SGX CDP account and Brokerage Account. If you are already investing in shares and trading on stock exchange then investing in REITs Singapore will be a cakewalk for you.0 comments0
